title: ipuDaina nannu
sahitya:
ipuDaina nannu dalacinArA svAmi



anupallavi



krpaku pAtruDanani kIrtincinArA



caraNam 1



daya cEsi nA mATalella nA tallitO balikina kolla nayamuga

      viNTi mIvalla nEDu nA manasuna nentO callanAyE



caraNam 2



unnata daya kAsakoNTi nEnu pannamulaku pAlaiyuNTi kannulAra 

     mimu gaNTi nEDu karNAmrtapu mATa viNTi svAmi



caraNam 3



palu rUpamulu tAnu bUni nannu bAdhinci vEDka jUcina palumAru 

     nannu necina puNya pApamu hari centagAni Emandu



caraNam 4



bhUmini buTTagalEnu bhUyO bhUyO harini namminAnu 

     tAmasamunu tALalEnu vara tyAgarAjAptuDu madilOnu
